name: Dice to the end
description:
This is a small game in which you will try to overcome an extremely difficult challenge, master the movement of a dice, because you know what makes a dice random is its movement, try to overcome the challenge in the shortest possible time, but be careful  because it is very difficult and a bit random.

It was created for the 2022 GMTK game Jam and was made mostly for unique designs but it did use an asset called Wild West City - Wild West Town - Wild West Sky City - Town which was created by :

Sidearm Studios - Environments.

This game was created by Iker M using Unreal Engine.
